item.title: What is a Woman? #IWD2023 [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
In this episode, Dr. Aaron Rock speaks truth into a hot question these days: What is a woman? Don't miss the answer to this important question and insights into womanhood as a whole!

More Resources:

item.title: 2 Years Later: Charges Laid & Lessons Learned [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
In this special Tuesday episode Aaron and Chris recap the events leading up to the charges laid against Aaron, where things are at today, and the lessons we can learn for the future.

 

Show Links:

1. Four part series taught by Dr. Aaron Rock in April-May of 2020: "Answering Moral and Theological Questions about the Global Pandemic"

2. The declaration written by Dr. Joe Boot and Dr. Aaron Rock: niagaradeclaration.ca

3. Dr. Aaron Rock's seminal article published November 25, 2020: "A Call to Divine Obedience over Civil Obedience"

 

More Resources:

We are excited to partner with the Fight Laugh Feast Network to reach more listeners. Download the app here: https://subsplash.com/fightlaughfeastnetwork/app

 

More resources at Dr. Aaron Rock’s blog: Pursuit of Glory https://pursuitofglory.org/

item.description:

What does scripture have to say about worship music? It's all here and more, in this week's episode of Leadership Now with Dr. Aaron Rock.

item.title: Stopping Mission Drift in Christian Institutions [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
In this episode, Dr. Aaron Rock discusses how well-meaning Christian hospitals, schools, pregnancy centers, seminaries, etc. are founded on the principles of God, but eventually lose their way and over time become just another secular institution. Listen in to find out why this topic is so crucial and what we can do as Christians to stop this broken cycle.

item.title: Forming Beachheads & Reshaping Culture [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
In this episode, Dr. Aaron Rock discusses steps Christians should be taking to protect themselves from being bullied, manipulated, coerced financially, and culturally, but also how we can come together to rebuild many of the dangerous and broken structures in culture.

item.title: Is Universal Income Equitable or Evil? [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
This week, Dr. Aaron Rock discusses Bill C-223 and our government's quest for Universal Basic Income here in Canada. He also answers listener's questions and gives a brief update on the results of the recent charter challenge regarding churches fined for meeting during lockdowns here in Ontario.
